text: Sweet Children is the third EP released by punk rock band Green Day. ==Track listing== All songs by Green Day, except where noted. Side A # "Sweet Children" – 1:41 # "Best Thing in Town" – 2:03 Side B #"Strangeland" – 2:08 #"My Generation" (Pete Townshend) – 2:19 ==References== ==Other websites== * Sweet Children EP on greendaydiscography.com Category:Green Day albums
title: Sweet Children (EP)
